website_summaries.verdict: Traditional hollow-wood nesting dolls with an animal theme.
pros: The animal-themed nesting doll set comes with 5 animals: a tiger, lion, pig, monkey, and bird
Made of wood and hand painted with attention to detail, these little dolls are a great toy or collector's item
cons: They're a bit tough to open since they stick together so well

customer_reviews.title: Cute but won't "nest"
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute nesting dolls. I only gave them 2 stars because when I open the lion all the other ones open too they don't stay closed so you lose the nesting surprise. If you just want them on a shelf open already they are great. They really are well made and the details are cute it is a shame they won't stay closed"( maybe mine are a fluke but we were disappointed in how they stack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Animal Nesting dolls for our daughters birthday and just opened it up. They are painted beautifully, except the 1st(largest) lion has a huge crack in the wood up the front & the hippo bottom is stuck in the tiger, the tiger doesn’t close all the way, and the monkey is completely stuck shut. We are very unsatisfied with this product and are not going to be able use it for its purpose of “nesting”. I have contacted the company in hopes they are able to send one in working, uncracked condition.
customer_reviews.author: Santi13

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids thought these were so cute with all the little surprises within each other. Lightweight even when all are stacked in each other. Fun to match up. All the pieces were nicely done. Not at all difficult to open each animal/ nesting doll. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Soler

customer_reviews.title: Made very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful make my three-year-old daughter loves these little animals the reminder of her little Russian dolls we are totally satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Durias

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love Nesting Dolls? ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3 year grand daughter. She loves them! Sturdy wood that has so far held up to many tiny hands at play dates. Old toys are still a great gift for little ones. Nesting dolls are old favorites for many kids. I was well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great toy... not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves to play with this. However, the largest piece (the lion) is not completely round and a little hard to close. I wish they make it so tops and bottoms fit interchangeably because my daughter is always getting the pig head stuck in the tiger bottom half. The paint looks like it’s going to peel off soon. Not sure hoy much this toy will last but my 3 yr old daughter loves it. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amybcd

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my daughter for Christmas. The largest doll, the lion had a minor imperfection on the inside. It didn’t bother me because it was inside and it’s wood and I know small flaws are bound to happen. However, it keeps getting bigger and now shows through to the front. It looks as though the maker tried to fill the hole with something and the painted over it to hide it. My daughter still plays with it and enjoys it but I’m afraid it won’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but very difficult to take apart.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute toy. I bought it for a two year old who loves to play with Matryoshka dolls. This one is way too tight. I could not even open them. I gave them to my husband to open and he had to sand them down so they are easier to take apart. Now I can open them but I’m not sure the two year old will be able to. The good thing about this set is that the smallest doll is still pretty large. Big enough I’m not concerned about it being a choking hazard. Each animal is cute and the toy looks pretty sturdy - maybe too sturdy to make it a fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loved it. She played with it the minute I opened it up. It kept her busy while I made dinner and she did not need me to be around for her to play. My only complaint was that the lion is hard to open up even for me but otherwise it is a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: NATD

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but needs help
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute toy that my grandson will love BUT the fittings are way too tight for a child to manage! I plan to sand and lightly oil the edges of each section and then it should work fine. Sturdy pieces, whimsical painting on the animals. Good product except for tightness issue.
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Thought I didn't receive and in fact I did
customer_reviews.text: I apologize for the request to return. I literally couldn't find the original that was sent and when Christmas day rolled around and stuff was opened, low and behold there it was. So in fact I got 2 and paid for 2 and I'm good with that. The kids love em'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was super cute. The animals are adorable. I was a little worried when I read other reviews but I am completely satisfied. I had no issues with cracked pieces, definitely no signs of mold. Some of the pieces fit a bit tight, but over time I’m sure they will go on easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Poncet

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but pieces don’t fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but pieces don’t fit great. I bought this for my toddler because she loves her older sisters dolls. However, the two largest dolls, the lion and tiger won’t even close because the wood is cut too wide. If I do close them all the way it’s nearly impossible to break them apart even for an adult much less a toddler. The pig is too loose and her pieces just fall apart. The only one that was really cut right was the monkey. However, they do I’ll fit inside one another. Just disappointed she can’t play with them exactly how they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Eawolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great with a little work
customer_reviews.text: Understand that if you buy this, you will need to use some sand paper to make some of the pieces fit more loosely so your little one can actually open them theirselves. If you’re willing to do that then they’re great. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: amm

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck!!! Frustrating to use/play with!
customer_reviews.text: Had to scrape and sand down some parts. And still gets stuck!!!!on the other hand a couple of the parts- do not stay together and fall apart when you pick it up at the top.... In other words : very frustrating!!!! Hi
customer_reviews.author: Bracha

customer_reviews.title: Not Top Quality, but Keeps Kids Entertained
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old enjoys this product. She likes finding the small bird and “rescuing” it. It’s adorable. I’m satisfied with the nesting dolls, however, I wish they weren’t so hard to open. I can’t leave them for my toddler to play with on her own because she always needs help open the first two dolls. I’ll have to sand them down. They are very hard open. Besides that I would say you get what you paid for. They’re not amazing, but they’re cute and get the entertaining job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy but difficult for an adult to pull pieces apart
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product sooo much, the characters are adorable and the colors are nice and bright. My one regret for these is that they do not come apart or go together easily enough for my 16 month old to manage. I bought this as a Christmas gift for her and feel, because it is a challenge for me to get them apart, it will become something she will need to bring me every time she wants to use it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaGreen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The monkey came a little damaged & was stuck almost all day. I finally was able to get it to open. My 14 month old twins love them, they can easily take them apart and put them back together.
customer_reviews.author: sethdavis

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and fun toy for toddlers. The first product sent to me arrived defective. The fourth animal/doll could not opened. However, if you encounter any issues, they provide great customer service and they will be able to assist you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design, but poorly made. The pink pig gets stuck inside the tiger and it is hard for an adult to remove. My toddler has been just throwing that one to the side and stacking the others.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: The dolls were reasonably well made but the largest was very difficult to separate into its two part. It took lots of muscle, and even after re-assemblying and separating several times it was hard to pull apart. I wound up sanding the inside mating surface of the doll to facilitate assembly-disassembly.
customer_reviews.author: BookFan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dolls :)
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and painted very well my son loved my owl stacking dolls so much I ordered him these so he could have his own and they're perfect and I love that the littlest one isn't so tiny like my other ones, it makes it safer for him :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needed sanding.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my granddaughter who is 3. I like the look of them. Was unhappy with the fact that I needed to sand a couple of them down to open and close easier and to get rid of some splinters.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 month old because she always plays with a set at my sister‘a house.. It’s not what I was expecting, but for the cost- I guess it’s what you get. . The pieces don’t fit together easily and there are splinters near the openings. Also has a weird smell. My daughter still likes them, but she gets frustrated when they don’t fit together as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for toddlers but animals may have cracks.
customer_reviews.text: We received this set today and my daughter loves them. They are adorable and she is already obsessed! I am disappointed in the overall make of the product though. Two of the animals had cracks in them when we received them. :( They seem to be pretty sturdy so I’m hoping they will still hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Henrickson

customer_reviews.title: Only for very strong babies
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute but I had to get my husband to take them apart cause they were really stick together! How is my toddler supposed to play with these if I, a grown woman, can’t even open them?
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels like cheaper wood. Doesn’t open and turn as easily. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy  Kandel

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: Can;t wait to put his in my 2 year old's stocking he is going to love it! Sturdy product as others have said it is a little hard to open but think it will easier as it is played with. Overall it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Crippen

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Paint job wasn’t great and pretty tight fit so gonna be somewhat hard for my 3yr old Brice to open them
customer_reviews.author: Josh Raab

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open; not great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I intended to give this as a gift to my nephew, but the halves of each "doll" are so tightly stuck together that it took me a solid 5 minutes to open the first doll! The wooden edges of each half are rough and somewhat jagged. Definitely NOT made for young children. I was very disappointed and do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Bought as a stocking stuffer and it was just such a cute little toy. Made of wood and pretty shiny painted surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Product deficits
customer_reviews.text: This product is so cute and I wanted my 3 year old grandson to have his own set since when he comes over he plays with my nesting dolls continually. As others have commented, each doll is difficult to open and close and there was a big crack in the "pig" doll that may in time break completely. I will give him the dolls, try to "soap" up the edges so that they slide better and hope for the best. May have to glue the crack so it doesn't get any bigger.
customer_reviews.author: K. Macchia

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: A very cute toy, however, I had purchased this as a gift for my 1 and a half year old daughter. I myself had difficulties in opening all of the four wooden nesting dolls. She obviously was unable to do so at all, and therefore, is unable to play with this toy at all. Was a bit disappointed and have already begun the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works as intended
customer_reviews.text: It's meant for a gift for a child, so I know it will get scuffed and played with often. It should endure that! It seems sturdy! Four stars because craftsmanship was so so, could use a bit of sanding down where the open ends meet... considering the price, I'm not complaining! Looks adorable!
customer_reviews.author: paul robbins

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but not suitable as a toy. Was looking for something for my curious 18month old. She loves to open and close containers and stack things. This was impossible for me to get open. Each doll stuck and 2 adults had a hard time opening. And the smallest nesting doll is so small it is def a chocking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive fun
customer_reviews.text: It definitely keeps the child focused on removing and rebuilding the pieces. 6 year old likes it. 2 year old doesn’t understand how it works but still somehow enjoys fooling around with it without getting terribly frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I just got a bad set but it was poorly made - my 4 year old was unable to open them by himself because if you can get them back together, they get stuck closed. Also the monkey won’t lock in place. A kid shouldn’t need adult assistance with a simple toy.... it’s going back
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Super stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 3 year old grandson. He will enjoy nesting them over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: pacificpci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a friend from Russia having her first baby. Absolutely loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is def cute for kids but the pieces don’t tightly close and if the child drops it, it could easily crack.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lee-Khvan

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within weeks
customer_reviews.text: Half the pieces are cracked within weeks of using And the fit of the tiger isn’t strong enough for it to stay together, which is half the point of the nesting dolls. I really wanted to like these but it was just a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Power

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This doll is great! My child likes it very much and the quality is very good. Very durable and very comfortable. The color is very sharp, just like the picture. The price of this product is very reasonable!!! Strongly recommend any child!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drew B

customer_reviews.title: Mold inside doll.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like it. They were cute and my son would’ve loved it. However, the largest doll had black mold on the inside. Given my son puts everything in his mouth and it’s mold I couldn’t give it to him. Unfortunately I will have to return it. :-(
customer_reviews.author: K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loved them. Although they were really difficult to open, so I had to sand the edges a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made - pieces stick together.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I purchased and they wouldn’t even open so they sent a replacement and those too stuck together. The pieces are badly formed. This product should be discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Great baby gift
customer_reviews.text: It was really difficult to open them. Wood kept sticking. Took some wax to it and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Cute design, good sized. Some were a little tight for my toddler to open himself, but a little sanding made it easier. He loves to play with this!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not easy!
customer_reviews.text: The nesting dolls were very rough- as an adult it was hard for me to work them!
customer_reviews.author: janet otepka

customer_reviews.title: Splintered pcs of wood fell off
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to pull apart. Splintered pcs of wood fell off. Awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Good but hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Little hard to open as a toy for my daughter. I even had difficulty getting it open for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nesting set
customer_reviews.text: Such an adorable nesting set. I’ve been looking for one for my daughter that she could actually play with and this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a 1 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter turner 1 this week and has been very into “containers”. I found these nesting dolls and knew they’d be a hit! She has not stopped playing with them since the package arrived - it’s an added bonus that they’re animals too. It’s also nice that they’re non toxic because she’s putting everything in her mouth
customer_reviews.author: LDMom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These were difficult to take apart and then could not be put back together to nest inside each other. Wood was too tight. It was totally frustrating for our grandchild. I would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold and Mildew beware
customer_reviews.text: Noticed immediately upon opening, there was mold and mildew growing in the wood of the largest animal and there was also a powdery white substance inside on one animal.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nesting animals!
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a stocking stuffer for my toddler son. He loves taking things apart & putting them back together. These nesting boxes are perfect & feature zoo animals too!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Witczak

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to pull apart
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and my 4 year old loves them, only complaint is they are difficult to come apart so I have to do it for her each time. Hoping they will wear down a bit and get easier for her to pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden toy
customer_reviews.text: Great wooden Montessori toy. The Russian dolls are a little hard to pull apart the first few times but afterwards it becomes easier. The colors are bright. Overall well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nested animal dolls
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but very tight. Had to file down and soap up so that children could easily open and close.
customer_reviews.author: norma cook

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter LOVES this nesting doll with animal motifs!! She’s been playing with it for an hour already. Good quality, not cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: ElisabethJT

customer_reviews.title: This toy is very useful for my child.
customer_reviews.text: When my child received this toy, he was very happy. After they were all taken out, the quality was also very good, and my children were very happy to play there. This is a very good product, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ulrike V

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: They are very tight and stiff. They are for a child, but I doubt a child could get them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline S. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open, paint chips
customer_reviews.text: Hard to open- even with adult strength. Paint chipped immediately. This will not be usable by my son.
customer_reviews.author: I. Bram

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my grandson. Was very hard to get apart. Hopefully it will get easier as time goes by and he plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: Best last minute gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a last minute stocking stuffer for my granddaughter. It is by far her favorite gift from Christmas. Two months later and she still plays with it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Kittle

customer_reviews.title: Quality expected!
customer_reviews.text: They were just as I thought they would be when ordering. Just a little trouble opening them the first time since they are wood pieces closed tightly together but all in all just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Wright

customer_reviews.title: Painted together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. While it is sturdy, mine came painted together - we had to cut through the paint layers.
customer_reviews.author: Jas VonD

customer_reviews.title: Good but hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Great look but difficult to open. I will need to sand it down a little for my child to be able to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N Core

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1-year-old son for Christmas. It will be difficult for him to open the dolls. They are hard to pry apart and make an awful squeaking noise. I couldn’t get the third level open! Don’t look too closely at workmanship. Just sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to open. Bought for my 7 year old son for Christmas and he needs help opening them every time. Would play with them more if he could do it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie

customer_reviews.title: Great doll...
customer_reviews.text: I used these dolls as gifts for my grandson, and he liked it. These dolls made of wood are light in weight and not as fragile as glass. This is a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon S.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult even for an adult to open to the next animal. Item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: They were nice looking for the kids, 4 and almost 2, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sebyot

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my grand daughter will love these when she opens her gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kika75

customer_reviews.title: Cute, stackable jungle animals!
customer_reviews.text: This are cute stackable jungle animals. I got them for my niece and she loved them! They seem well made and are a good simple toy.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Wished the "Lion" is much lighter for toddlers little hands😁 overall however I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves nesting toys. This set was pretty tough for him to work at first, but is now doing better.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Cute nesting animals
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter enjoys the nesting animals! She has some trouble opening them but this doesn’t take away from her enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Nesting toy
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but the animals are even hard for me to open so its not really suitable for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: DIRTY AND FULL OF MOLD
customer_reviews.text: Each piece had dirt on it and the insides were full of mold. Not acceptable for children to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Chris reis

customer_reviews.title: Good for my 2 year old niece
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece, and she loves it! The smaller few are a little tough for her to open, but she loves the animals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to take apart
customer_reviews.text: These were very cute, but very hard to take apart and put back together. The pieces were just too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Ours came chipped(wood) and hard for child to open. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Paint looks good tough to pull apart to begin with
customer_reviews.text: Paint looks really good only complaint is tough to pull apart but just needs a little breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended/ Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. Hard to play with and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chirico

customer_reviews.title: Very last piece is so tiny we dont use it
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are beautifully painted and the roundness makes them easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bree from Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get open in order to nest them
customer_reviews.text: We had to return these as they were almost impossible to open
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves to play with these. They are great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amber C

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to play with and easy to pack back up. My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.author: Tara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: We received this for Christmas for our son and absolutely love it. They’re made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Audra R

customer_reviews.title: Does not open
customer_reviews.text: The first doll opens fine, but we cannot get the second doll open at all. It is sealed.
customer_reviews.author: angie drew

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: The largest one was hard to open. Not good for kids. The rest were ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mary lou

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Pieces do not fit well together well. Very difficult to pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Russell

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer cute for children
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap but seems to be made well ! Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Best toy
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot and my son played with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wigder

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love how cute they are! Hard to get the two bigger ones open , but still worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Animal nesting
customer_reviews.text: Okay quality, definitely not perfect, the first one had a misshape to the too
customer_reviews.author: Ashley frey

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves taking it a part and putting back together
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hale

customer_reviews.title: Darling
customer_reviews.text: Darling wooden gift for a one year old girl. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute cant wait for my little ones to open them on Christmas day!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Well made and unique.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate how well crafted these are, and they are incredibly cute.
customer_reviews.author: bobby irons

product_meta.title: Maxshop 5 Pieces 6" Tall Cute Nesting Dolls - Handmade Wooden Different Pattern Small Items - Matryoshka Doll Handmade Wooden Dolls Cartoon Animals Pattern Toy Gift
feature_bullets: ★EXQUISITE DESIGN:Contains 5 different sizes Handmade Wooden nesting dolls with 5 different pattern:Bear, Tiger, Pig, Monkey, Bird. Each Doll Stacks Inside the Other.
★Great Birthday Christmas Gift for little Children or house decoration, fun for animal lovers and fans of arts and crafts.
★CAN BE STORED:Nested dolls can be opened to store small items,Can be used to store jewelry, sundries, candy, etc.
★Quality Guaranteed, Manual check Every one before sending out
★Warm Tips: Due to the wooden rotary knob design, little Children with small power may need Parents' help to open the Animal Nesting Dolls in the first time use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars293 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
